programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Taiga: The Frozen Forest
programme.desc: Containing one third of the world's trees, the frozen forests of the Taiga are the lungs of the planet. This great forest spans across shores of the Pacific, sheltering some of the Earth's most majestic animals, and some of its most secretive.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Okavango: Water in the Desert
programme.desc: The Okavango Delta, a huge emerald oasis in the burning heart of the Kalahari desert, is fed by the Okavango River and this perpetual cycle of wet and dry is the lifeblood of this extraordinary natural Eden.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Virungas: Land of Ice and Fire
programme.desc: It's home to some of the world's most iconic animals  including the African great apes.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: The Andes: World in the Clouds
programme.desc: The longest chain of mountains in the world, the Andes run the length of western South America and dictate the climate for the whole continent. They include some of the highest peaks outside the Himalayas.

programme.title: Wildest India: The Himalayas: Surviving the Summits
programme.desc: The Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India. he Himalayas' rugged highlands offer little direct refuge to humans, in the shadow below, over a billion people in India rely on the mountains for survival.

programme.title: Push
programme.desc: Superhumans defy a government plot to harness and abuse their powers. Chris Evans and Dakota Fanning (the TWILIGHT films) team in a pulse-pounding paranormal thriller.

programme.title: The Sentinel

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: Radio astronomer Zane Zaminsky believes he has picked up a cosmic noise that signals extraterrestrial intelligence. His desperate search for answers leads him to discover that aliens are already on Earth and in the process of preparing to take it over.

programme.title: Overdrawn At The Memory Bank
programme.desc: A weather tech's mind gets trapped in a computer and Pearl establishes her own public television pledge program.

programme.title: The Brute Man

programme.title: Red Zone Cuba

programme.title: Jungle Goddess

programme.desc: When a murder is committed and deceit clouds the evidence, investigators turn to science and technology to uncover the truth and expose a murderous lie and capture the killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Tainted Blood
programme.desc: The forces of nature can reduce a body to bones in a matter of weeks. Using a unique combination of art and science, forensic anthropologists give victims a face long after they have been forgotten.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Shattered Vows
programme.desc: A woman is found dead at the bottom of the basement stairs. As detectives look into the accident, they begin to question the sequence of events.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Out To Kill
programme.desc: An abandoned car outside Philadelphia brings heartbreak to a family and terror to a community. A young woman is dead, the killer gone. But the marks of his passage remain.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: For the chefs' next challenge, Chef Ramsay pits the teams against one another, preparing authentic Chinese dishes as prominent Chinese Chef Shirley Chung is brought in to judge their finished dishes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With the dining room transformed into an Italian bistro, all eight chefs learn that they will participate in the beloved blind taste test challenge, gelato edition. With two tables of 12 patrons, the chefs rush to see who finishes first.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The seven remaining chefs are called down to the dining room to discover two ice dancers performing a routine. Chef Ramsay explains ice dancing can be romantic, just as dessert can be. For their challenge they must cook an extraordinary dessert.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: In the first challenge, the final six chefs break through a case, retrieving a random ingredient they will have to cook with. The second challenge has each chef cooking with the same four ingredients. The third challenge is a surf and turf challenge.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The five chefs compete in Chef Ramsay's Taste It, Now Make It challenge, recreating his intricate eggs benedict dish. Later, the fish station struggles at dinner service, leaving the chef in charge of it in real danger of being sent home.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs undertake a tableside challenge, creating dishes for esteemed brigades acting as judges. Later, elimination surprises everyone, including Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel hammers down on the best builds of season 2

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel is back at it, as one of his most eccentric clients throws down the challenge on a lead sled transformation

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the Lead Sled Challened

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel does the unthinkable with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the journey with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel attempts to complete his wild show car

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Answering a distress call leads the crew to pick up Beka's brother, now a Wayist, and his friend.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Banks of the Lethe
programme.desc: A black hole allows Dylan to communicate with his former fiancée, 300 years in the past.

programme.title: Andromeda: A Rose in the Ashes
programme.desc: Dylan is imprisoned on a prison planet and must stage an escape as his crew tries to stage their own rescue.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Castalians board the Andromeda to finalize the charter for the New Commonwealth. When the leader is discovered dead, Tyr is the main suspect.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka learns that her father's former business partner deals in a highly addictive drug called F lash.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda discovers her sister ship, the Pax Magellanic. The crew aboard Pax is 300 years old, but have not aged a day.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Seeking Siegfried
programme.desc: Katikati man Siegfried Newman disappeared on February 25, 2008, after he had dropped his sons Thomas, 9, and Oliver, 7, at Pahoia School. Police carried out a three-day search but found no sign of him.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: In 1957, nine-year-old Peter Boland was on holiday having the time of his life on a remote farm in New Zealand when he simply vanished without a trace. Peter’s older brother Gavin Boland, a self-confessed sceptic, turns to Sensing Murder’s psychics.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Mother's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Otautau toddler Amber-Lee, aged two and a half, vanished from Kingston at the southern tip of Lake Wakatipu on October 17, 1992.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Psychics Revealed - Special
programme.desc: Behind the scenes with the psychics on the show.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Date With a Serial Killer: Rodney Cameron
programme.desc: Rodney Francis Cameron was dubbed ‘The Lonely Hearts Killer’ after he used a radio match-making program in 1990 to lure an unsuspecting woman to her death. Incredibly, he had only just been released from prison for two other killings in 1974.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Moorhouse Horrors / The Call Girl Killing
programme.desc: We investigate the story of David and Catherine Birnie, Australia's most sadistic husband and wife killing team, who tortured, raped and murdered four women in 1986.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.desc: In 1981, the headless and fingerless body of 19-year-old Kim Narelle Barry was found dumped in the bush at a mountain lookout near Wollongong, south of Sydney.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The King And I
programme.desc: Jodi’s world is turned upside down when she receives a birthday gift from the late Jack McLeod.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Intentions
programme.desc: Dave is blackmailed by a student and has to fight to save his career.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Stranger than Fiction
programme.desc: Moira predicts a wave of terrible trouble – and Moira is never wrong.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: 12 and a Half Hours Behind
programme.desc: Tess returns to Drovers to discover she is ten weeks pregnant, but an even bigger shock is in store…

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Anniversary
programme.desc: Tess decides to hold a party to celebrate Nick’s life, but has she really accepted that he’s gone?

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Body And Soul
programme.desc: Alex is not coping with Nick’s death and disappears from his friends’ lives.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to the historic St. Charles, Missouri to investigateMain Street's hauntings.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Fright At The Opera
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the team anticipates the possibility of encountering a demonic entity at the Burlingame & Chaffee Opera House, in Carthage, Missouri.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: There Ghosts The Neighborhood
programme.desc: TAPSis called out to Joplin, Missouri to help 3 generations of afamilyliving on one haunted estate! Could both houses on the property harbor entities that couldbring harm to their children?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Plot Thickens
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, owners of a haunted theatre in Woonsocket, Rhode Island buy the building next door and activity spikes! TAPS investigates both buildings to see if spirits are traveling between the two locations.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fortress of Phantoms
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads tothe historic Fort Adams in Newport, Rhode Island. The teams investigate three deadly eventsthat surprisingly weren't from battle!

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Houghton Hears A Who?
programme.desc: TAPS investigates Houghton Mansionin North Adams, Massachusetts where the repercussions of a deadly car accident could be behind unexplained phenomena on the property.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tough Love
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Can Bet On It!
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fly Boy
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Friend in Need
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in. To complicate matters, this fugitive lives in a tightly-knit community where good information won't come easy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Razing the Snakes
programme.desc: Jase, Jep, Si and Cole try to fight back a growing population of cottonmouth snakes on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Willie uses his business expertise to help Rebecca improve her clothing store.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Uneasy Rider
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires when Will decides to get a motorcycle instead. Jase and the guys are inspired to design a product using zip lines that will revolutionize duck hunting.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Willie Hunting
programme.desc: While many of the guys' wives and children are in Africa doing charity work, Willie and Jase get into a debate over tracking ability which leads to a challenge--can Jase and Si track and capture Willie and Jep?

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sleep Cover
programme.desc: With Korie still in Africa, Willie and Jep must step in and supervise Bella's sleepover. When a couple boys play a prank on the girls, Willie and Jep prove to be the perfect chaperones for the task.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drive-In Revivin'
programme.desc: Korie challenges Willie to come up with a romantic gesture without spending any money. Missy and Jase compete to see who can find a girlfriend for Mountain Man.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fishful Thinking
programme.desc: Jase's hopes to win the inaugural Duck Commander Fishing Tournament is buoyed when he is able to enlist the help of legendary angler Bill Dance. Meanwhile, Willie's vanity over his greying beard leads him to make a questionable decision.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: Once, inmates in Armenian prisons fell into the hands of the "Thieves in Law," a criminal brotherhood rejecting state authority and living by its own code.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: La Mesa, A Mexican prison just over the US border. The inmates? Drug traffickers, rapists, cartel killers. They have tough times ahead.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Dambusters
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid. A routine C-46 flight becomes dangerous when a hole in the plane's aging exhaust system sets off the fire alarm.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Chuck Walks
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits. Joe clashes with the maintenance department when a series of delays puts the sale of an old Canso waterbomber in jeopardy.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Gear Up, Gear Down
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over. Devan, Ian and Jimmy deal with a hydraulic fluid leak in the C-46 on the valley run.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Big Boost
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage, Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul. Cory leads a rescue mission to retrieve an abandoned C-46 and Mikey escapes to Ottawa for a birthday joyride in a fighter jet.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Enough Is Enough
programme.desc: Dwight has had it with Roxy's mental abuse. Dwight says Roxy has cost him multiple jobs because she's constantly harassing him at work, but she says he needs to give her the attention she deserves! Can Judge Toler help them see eye to eye?

programme.title: Divorce Court: All Eyes on Me
programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure he’s alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesn’t consider it cheating because he’s not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Cheating Husband
programme.desc: Corey has cheated on his wife with 27 women and wants a divorce because he can't trust her. She cheated once and can't get over how she hid it from him. He also argues that his 27 times were purely physical, but hers was an emotional affair.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if he’s straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing women’s underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Like a Virgin
programme.desc: Emily is 29 and a virgin. The pressure from her boyfriend Romeo to have sex is overwhelming. Their 20 year age difference may be part of the problem because she chats it up more with strangers than him. Can Judge Toler help them find common ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Players Club
programme.desc: When this couple met on the internet, they instantly hit it off. Though, when Ray found out Raina was creating sexy videos for pay, he wasn’t so keen. He believes that she is meeting up with her followers and having relations for more money.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicia’s text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Operation Repo: T-Bone Trouble
programme.desc: The team's work with anger management starts to pay off - with disastrous consequences. Matt and Sonia get into a standoff with a wealthy divorcee, his daughter, and her raging boyfriend.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Flame-Thrown for a Loop
programme.desc: Lou struggles to pick up the pieces after the accident leaves him needing Sonia more than ever. Lou and Carlos deal with a big man in a tiny car, but when Carlos lets his guard down he's delivered some serious blows.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Probation Abomination
programme.desc: Sonia returns, but not before putting the team on probation and laying some ground rules.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Russian Roulette
programme.desc: Matt and Sonia take on an award-winning fencing coach, but all bets are off when his students go on the offensive with real swords.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Little Froy's Big Mistake
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take on a grungy fisherman, but when he isn't afraid to damage his own boat, Froy is the one who is sinking fast.

programme.title: Operation Repo: M.I.A. & D.E.A
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy go missing, Sonia is on a mission to figure out what they've got up their sleeves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Suspicious Packages
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy repo a hummer from a bachelorette who is down to party, but when the cops arrive it's the repo team who is in for a shock.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Match Point
programme.desc: Duty calls and the Chapmans are off on a hunt. The team chases a fugitive who has disappeared into a world of "no known addresses."

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.

programme.title: The Game: When The Chickens Come Home To Roost, Part I
programme.desc: During EPSY week in Los Angeles, Derwin gets an unexpected endorsement deal and is left to celebrate with Drew Sidora, while Melanie is busy studying in San Diego.

programme.title: The Game: When The Chickens Come Home To Roost, Part II
programme.desc: During EPSY week in Los Angeles, Derwin gets an unexpected endorsement deal and is left to celebrate with Drew Sidora, while Melanie is busy studying in San Diego.

programme.title: The Game: Diary Of A Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Derwin learns that it may be too late to reunite with Melanie after his infidelity when Melanie shows up with an old friend, Trey Wiggs, to help collect her stuff and move out for good.

programme.title: The Game: The Trey Wiggs Taps Back Episode
programme.desc: Homeless, heartbroken, and distraught, Melanie turns to Derwin's rival, Trey Wiggs, for comfort.

programme.title: The Game: Tasha, Renee and Malik The Cliché
programme.desc: When Renee is unable to engage in romantic affairs with Malik after she learns that he lives with his mother; it prompts Malik to ask Melanie for advice, and eventually explain to Tasha that they will need alternate their living arrangements.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev's Baby Girl
programme.desc: It's time for JoJo and his group, Blackout, to hit the studio and begin recording tracks for their record. However, JoJo, Zach and Reggie are discouraged by the list of producers Latchkey Recordings has available to them.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Comes Home
programme.desc: Rev and Justine return from visiting their adopted baby they'll soon be able to call their own. They get the family excited with the news that they will have a new sister living in the house in a few days.

programme.title: Run's House: Mind on the Road
programme.desc: Season Five kicks off when Rev Run home for a short visit in between gigs of his concert tour with good pal, Kid Rock.

programme.title: Run's House: Bonless Chicken Dinner
programme.desc: The episode begins with Rev Run on stage in what is his final performance of his tour with Kid Rock. Rev returns home and his hopes of getting his diet back on track are thwarted by Russy's new cooking hobby.

programme.title: Run's House: Pass The Frame
programme.desc: With the final mix of their debut album just around the corner, Team Blackout takes the next step in their pursuit of ultimate rap dominance: self-promotion.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: If I Should Die...
programme.desc: Proven paranormal investigator Ken Arrington leads a new class of characters as they try to help a family cope with what appears to be a demonic spirit in their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.desc: Once night falls in a quaint?New England Town, a police officer's family is terrorized by demons.?PRS arrives just in time with the family ready to vacate their family home, rather than suffer the advances of these spirit creatures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hell's Gate
programme.desc: Ever since Wes and his family moved into their new home in York, PA they've been struggling with a dark force that's made everyday a living hell. Wes feels his mental and physical health is in jeopardy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Bedroom Eyes
programme.desc: PRS travels to rural Pennsylvania to investigate a haunting that began after a new couple moved into an old family farm.?Over the next three days, hidden tragedies are uncovered and latent psychic abilities are revealed.

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this large manor house that is said to be swarming with paranormal activity of every kind, and gets more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt2
programme.desc: The creaky corridors and old rooms of Nunnington Hall have many stories of ghosts and phantoms, Stuart investigates the middle floors and starts to experience unexplained happenings.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette & Mary enter the vast expanse of the very haunted A-Wing on their own and soon start to regret their decision.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison Pt2
programme.desc: With Yvette and Mary investigating A-Wing, Karl & Stuart take on the formidable C-Wing where the unhappy spirits of past residents are said to roam.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt1
programme.desc: The formidable visage of Guys Cliff House, a once great home, is awe inspiring, as are the stories pf paranormal activity within. Now home to the Masonic fraternity it is home to two temples and many lodges and chapters.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt2
programme.desc: The lower Temple in this once great, but now ruined castle, is steeped in history and tales pf ghostly happenings. Stuart investigates a room that is said to house multiple spirits and feels something is watching him in the dark.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt1
programme.desc: With paranormal activity of every kind, Dorchester Prison isn’t for the faint hearted. Karl takes on the prison block where aggressive phantoms and poltergeists are said to roam.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Whose Trash Is It Anyway?

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Silent Bell

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Reunion

programme.title: Arthur: Lights, Camera...Opera!/All Worked Up
programme.desc: When Muffy's Dad gives her concert tickets, she couldn't be more excited--until she discovers that she's going to the opera. And Arthur aced five quizzes in a row! But his luck runs out when Mom takes a new job.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Babysits/Arthur's Cousin Catastrophe
programme.desc: You think running a marathon is hard? Try babysitting for the Terrible Tibble Twins. Next, Arthur's family is hosting the once-a-year-is-more-than-enough family reunion. But a major thunderstorm turns this into a reunion to remember.

programme.title: Arthur: Two Minutes/Messy Dress Mess
programme.desc: Power shifts in the Tibble household when the twins find out Tommy is two minutes older than Timmy. Ladonna's thrilled when Muffy loans her a beautiful recital dress, but a run-in with a painted bench creates a problem.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Second Chance/Arthur and the Whole Truth
programme.desc: With the help of a little time travel, Buster turns back the clock to see what his life would be like if he were a genius. Arthur isn't happy when he discovers that Buster has been telling him some white lies, just to spare his feelings.

programme.title: Arthur: Francine's Split Decision/Muffy Goes Metropolitan
programme.desc: Lakewood Elementary is sure to win the big bowling tournament on Saturday, but Francine's cousin is having his Bar Mitzvah at the same time! Muffy happily accepts an invitation to spend the weekend in the bustling Crown City.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., All Fired Up/I'd Rather Read It Myself
programme.desc: When Ms. Morgan announces they'll be having a fire drill during preschool, D.W. wants no part of it--it sounds way too scary. Then, the Tibble Twins are better than D.W. at just about everything.

programme.title: Arthur: When Carl Met George/D.W. Swims with the Fishes
programme.desc: George is excited about his new friend, Carl. Then George learns that Carl has Asperger's Syndrome – can they remain good friends? D.W. and James enter the pre-school swim meet and recruit their big siblings to coach them.

programme.title: Arthur: The Tattletale Frog/D.W. & Bud's Higher Purpose
programme.desc: When Bud is blamed for an accident D.W. causes, she has to decide whether to let her friend take the fall. D.W. and Bud can't wait to ride a new rollercoaster. Will they make it past the ticket taker, or will they come up short?

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen's Lost Diary/Arthur's Knee
programme.desc: Poor Sue Ellen has lost the one thing she's never without--her diary. Then, Arthur's hurt his knee but won't tell Mom--because then she'd know he'd been playing down at the dump , where he was NOT allowed to go.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The second episode starts on the morning of the 22nd of June 1941 when the Germans launched operation Barbarossa, the code name for the invasion of the Soviet Union.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The third episode opens with Rommel’s second offensive in North Africa.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The fourth episode sees the Germans well and truly on the retreat and the Allies are able to successfully implement operation Husky: the landing on Sicily.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Hitting Back
programme.desc: After surviving the German bombing campaign of British cities, RAF Bomber Command struck back against Germany. The devastating consequences of raids, for both for the young men in the skies and the people on the ground, are portrayed in this film.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Getting Home
programme.desc: In this film, Bomber Command personnel and a Luftwaffe pilot take the viewer through the frightening reality of fighting in the skies as they try to get a damaged bomber home.

programme.title: War Story: Bomb Girls Remember
programme.desc: During the Second World War, 250,000 Canadian women helped to build the arsenal of democracy. These young women met the challenges of factory work and helped to win the Second World War, and by doing so, paved the way for future generations.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Max and co-host iO Tillett Wright help 18-year-old Mecca connect with the boy she's loved for the past 5 years. But when iO discovers that Mecca's digital beau may be using her pictures to catfish others, Mecca needs answers.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Vince can't seem to escape his online-ex, Alyssa, whose stalking has caused his real life girlfriend, Liz, to break up with him. Nev and Max help Vince confront Alyssa so he can try to salvage a future with Liz.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Kailani has fallen for Sam, her gay friend's online ex-boyfriend. Sam claims to love Kailani, but has been acting strange since she has tried to meet up with him. Nev and Max investigate. (S6, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After months of sexting with a hot model he met on a hookup app, Marvin is eager to meet him in person. Max and sidekick, singer Chantal Claret, agree to help Marvin find his crush. (S6, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Keyonnah & Bow Wow

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Mortician, The Murder, The Movie
programme.desc: When an elderly millionaire is found dead in a freezer, her decades-younger companion is brought up on murder charges; the movie inspired by the story, \Bernie.\

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: In 1986, 21-year-old Mitzi Nalley was brutally murdered in her Austin, Texas home. Police arrested Jonathan Wayne Nobles, who confessed to the crime and was sentenced to the death penalty.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Walking Free
programme.desc: The story of David Camm, who was convicted in two murder trials -- each eventually overturned -- and was found not guilty in his third trial for the murder of his wife and two children.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: One Last Hug
programme.desc: An updated report on growing dangers of dating and breakup violence, focusing on Melissa Dohme, who agreed to meet a former boyfriend, Robert Burton, for one last hug before they broke up forever. The decision nearly cost her her life.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Body of Lies
programme.desc: In 2006, 31-year-old Leisha Hurst, while attending Barstow College, began dating fellow student, 34-year-old Jeami Chiapulis. Chiapulis seemed to be the man she could settle down with. The couple had plans to marry when Hurst vanished on January 22, 2009

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Council pt. 1
programme.desc: Jim Phelps leads the IMF on an assignment to destroy the syndicate, a criminal empire headed by Frank Wayne.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Council pt. 2
programme.desc: The IMF continues its fight against organized crime.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Astrologer
programme.desc: The IMF accepts a critical mission to rescue Nikolai Kurzon, the leader-in-exile of the Baltic state of Veyska who has been kidnapped by Col. Stahl (Steve Ihnat), head of the secret police.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Echo of Yesterday
programme.desc: The resurgence of neo-Nazism in Germany takes the IMF to Bavaria, where Marcus von Frank (Hans Gudegast) threatens to become a second Hitler.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Photographer
programme.desc: The imagination of the IMF is put to the test when a massive spy ring in the U.S. headed by fashion photographer, David Redding, threatens to cripple the country with a deadly pneumonic plague.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: You Can Count on Me
programme.desc: Barney helps his friends discover just how fun numbers can be by taking them on a number hunt in the park. Baby Bop delights in sharing her favorite number and the kids discover that numbers can be found everywhere.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bonjour Barney!
programme.desc: Emma wants to paint an award-winning painting for the "Art In The Park Show," but she is just isn't satisfied with her artwork. Barney takes her to France to learn how to paint from his friend Pierre.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When some of the children in the park invite Barney to join them for a race./When BJ starts to feel sick after eating too many sweets, he lies down in hopes of feeling better.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Little Red Rock'n Hood - Differences
programme.desc: Baby Bop is having a hard time finding a story she hasn't heard before. Barney and the little dinos decide to tell her an old story with a new twist! They tell the story of "Little Red Riding Hood" in a whole new way...by singing it!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ sings that he wants to be a rock and roll star. Baby Bop sings that she wants to be a country music star. BJ gets mistaken for the artist who painted a portrait of Barney.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Squares, Squares Everywhere
programme.desc: Nick's homework is to find as many squares as he can. It's great fun when Barney and the kids help!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Butterflies - Nature Of Things
programme.desc: Baby Bop is sad because she lost her pet caterpillar, Monty. Barney and the others try to help her find it. Baby Bop is surprised to discover Monty inside a chrysalis. Everyone is excited to find Monty—now a beautiful butterfly!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Riff is asked to be captain of a baseball team, he doesn’t think he can do it. But Barney gives him the courage to try.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Louisiana Purchase
programme.desc: In Louisiana, Ton and Allen encounter some salty locals at a shipping crate auction, and navigate choppy waters at a boat auction. After spending a lot of cash, they find a tactical blast shield and a bass fishing boat.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rock-et to Me!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen end up in a turf war at a Hollywood auction and at odds with each other over whether to gamble on what could be an antique slot machine. Allen attempts to fly a jetpack.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Carolyn Goes Topless
programme.desc: A friendly competition with former employee Carolyn turns into a vicious battle for a 1968 Corvette Stingray, giving Carolyn the last laugh. Allen tests his Ninja skills with an antique sickle weapon.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Machine Gun Ton
programme.desc: Ton and Allen battle a pair of vicious female auction hunters who have an axe to grind and bid based on spite rather than strategy. And a gatling gun & suit of armor are worth much less than the guys expected.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Betsy's Last Stand
programme.desc: With their beloved bread truck on life support, Ton and Allen head to an auction to help save her. Will an industrial grinder and a classic Chevy be enough to mend Betsy, or will the guys be forced to say goodbye for good?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: You Foos You Lose
programme.desc: When their truck breaks down, Ton and Allen lay it all on the line to raise money to fix her. They score a Foosball table, Tommy Gun drums and to Ton's delight, a treasure trove of Twinkies, but will it be enough?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Blazing Saddles
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to a Hollywood auction and face a new competitor with a seemingly endless cash flow. After they uncover a triple barrel shotgun and an antique camel saddle, Allen confronts an old childhood fear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Early Bird Special
programme.desc: Vintage Shooting Star carnival game; professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage.

programme.title: Guess Who’s Coming to Christmas Dinner?
programme.desc: Law student Maya brings her new boyfriend home for the holidays, neglecting to tell her family that he's - well - white. Maya has one week to persuade her family that this is true love, will she be able to pull off this Christmas miracle?

programme.title: Grumpy Cat's Worst Christmas Ever
programme.desc: Grumpy Cat is an Internet meme sensation with over 6 million Facebook friends, who has graced the cover of New York Magazine, is the spokescat for Friskies, appeared on American Idol and the MTV Movie Awards.

programme.title: Holiday in Your Heart

programme.title: Megan's Christmas Miracle

programme.title: The Lost World: Under Pressure
programme.desc: A handsome stranger stumbles onto the plateau and becomes close with the explorers. While he gains the attention of Marguerite and Veronica, Challenger's electrostatic accumulator is targeted.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Tim Brooke-Taylor and Graeme Garden get back into character as they join Will Axon and Philip Serrell and take to the road in Devon. Along the way, these off-the-wall comedians enter the equally surreal world of two eccentric inventors.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Hermione Norris and John Thomson join up with Mark Stacey and Catherine Southon on a classic car trip through Cornwall, aiming to buy antiques for auction in London. On the way, John learns nautical history and Hermione takes off.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander and Martin Roberts trade homes for antiques! Paired up with experts James Braxton and James Lewis, they scour Hampshire in search of bargains to sell at auction for profit--to benefit Children in Need.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Frances Barber and Phil Davis join Catherine Southon and Thomas Plant on a buying spree around East Sussex. Armed with £400 and a classic car, they hear a gripping tale of eccentricity and attempted murder on the way to auction in London.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: The Future's Bright
programme.desc: Megan wants a new baby, Mia has her first night out since Marliya was born and Chloe makes a decision about Jordan. Naomi gets mad when an unexpected guest shows up at Kya's party. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: New Beginnings
programme.desc: While Megan drops a baby bombshell on Dylan, Naomi moves on from Raphael. Meanwhile, Chloe and Jordan go house hunting, Mia sets her mind on marriage, and Ste tells Amber he's found love. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: A New Arrival
programme.desc: Brand new Teen Mom UK is back, and mums Chloe, Mia, Megan and Amber are being joined by a sassy newcomer. Get ready for tears, tantrums and true love with our tenacious Brit teen girls. (S2, ep1)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Relationship Woes
programme.desc: New mum Sassi chooses a surprising new career, Chloe clashes with her mum, Mia and Megan have relationship misery and for Amber, love is in the air. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jerry & Karla
programme.desc: Jerry needs help meeting his first love Karla. Karla claims to have already met Jerry but refuses to talk to him on the phone. Can Oobah and Nella find out if Karla is who she says she is? (S2, ep1)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Decades of Deceit
programme.desc: An Internet-savvy investigator works to solve a decades-old murder case.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Last Chance for Justice
programme.desc: A report on the 1980 murder of Marilyn McIntyre, who was found dead in her home. Her husband, Lane, had returned home from work that morning and found her body. As police checked into his alibi, he named his friend Curt Forbes as a potential suspect.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Ryan Ferguson: Wrongful Conviction
programme.desc: The case of Ryan Ferguson, who was released from prison in 2013, after nearly 10 years behind bars for murder. 48 HOURS team have been investigating the murder and the bizarre circumstances that put Ryan Ferguson in prison for the crime since 2006

programme.title: 48 Hours: Getting Away with Murder?
programme.desc: A report on families who have experienced the violent death of a loved one and believe they know the identity of the killer but lack evidence to back the charge.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Why Did Josh Kill?
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Maddie Clifton of Jacksonville, Florida went outside to play and never came back. Seven days later a city-wide search led to the home of Josh Phillips, a 14-year-old neighbor, where Maddie's body was found under the boy's waterbed.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E7 - I, E.T.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E9 - DNA Mad Scientist
programme.desc: A scientist extracts DNA from several of Moya's crew, promising them that he would be able to use it to find the location of their home planets.

programme.desc: During routine searches for Peacekeeper beacons, D'Argo falls down a chute, destroys a Peacekeeper shield and gets ejected into open space.
